author: Sara M Moniuszko
title: 'Moonlight,' 'Arrival' take top WGA honors
text:

Join the Nation's Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs 'Moonlight,''Arrival' take top WGA honors Sara M Moniuszko , USA TODAY 9:19 a.m. ET Feb. 20, 2017 Alex Hibbert in 'Moonlight,' nominated for a GLAAD Media Award and for a best picture Oscar. (Photo: David Bornfriend, AP) 29 CONNECT COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Moonlight has another award to add to its shelf. 
The film won the 2017 Writers Guild of America award for best original screenplay on Sunday. The film’s screenplay was written by Barry Jenkins with story by Tarell Alvin McCraney. Best adapted screenplay went to sci-fi Arrival , and best documentary screenplay went to Command and Control . Both Moonlight and Arrival are up for writing awards at the Oscars this upcoming Sunday. 
On the television side of the awards, FX’s Atlanta took home the title as both best comedy series and best new series. The best adapted long form also went to FX, for The People vs. O.J. Simpson: American Crime Story .
